p: After the release of the podcast, the guest is celebrated the entire week on several social media platforms—Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn. The celebration entails sharing audio snippets of notable parts of the discussion. Show notes based on the podcast discussion are also published on the podcast website (https://watersavvysolutions.com/podcast). BGC discussions are always accompanied by respected and reliable sources, provided in the show notes, which supports more education through the podcast. The show notes are presented in an informal, blog-style format and include an overview of the topics and issues discussed, as well as links to additional resources related to the episode topic.
